name: Rogue8
description:
A mini roguelike in under 1024 bytes! Weave, dodge, and fight your way through mobs of creeps. Grab their gold. Survive. Watch out though, area bosses occasionally drop by, bringing many creeps along with them!

Move & Attack: ← ↑ ↓ →

Having trouble? Don't forget, you can also attack diagonally, while the enemy creeps cant!
